trait.name: Novice
trait.tooltip: You have an been acknowledged as someone who could one day influence the fate of Middle-Earth
trait.description: You have been acknowledged as someone who could one day influence the fate of Middle-Earth

trait.name: Riding
trait.tooltip: You are able to ride mounts.
trait.description: You are able to ride mounts.

trait.name: Appraising Eye
trait.tooltip: Increased Armour Debuff with Reveal Weakness
trait.description: You are skilled at detecting even the smallest weaknesses in your enemy's armour when using your Reveal Weakness skill.

trait.name: Ambidextrous
trait.tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by your off-hand weapon
trait.description: You are able to wield your off-hand weapon more efficiently, dealing greater damage to your foes.

trait.name: Stick and Move
trait.tooltip: This effect enables you to gain critical responses from both critical responses and evade combat events.
trait.description: Skills that are normally unlocked by scoring Critical Hits now also unlock when you successfully Evade an attack.

trait.name: Flashing Blades
trait.tooltip: After using your Double-edged Strike, you can make two attacks against your target.
trait.description: After using your Double-edged Strike, you can make two additional attacks against your target.

trait.name: Sweep the Leg
trait.tooltip: Trip no longer breaks stealth and it reduces it's cooldown by 40 seconds.
trait.description: Trip no longer breaks stealth and it reduces it's cooldown by 40 seconds.

stat.name: Skill_RecoveryTime_BurglarSweepTheKnee
stat.descriptionOverride: Decreases Trip reset time by ${VALUE} Seconds

trait.name: Exposed Throat
trait.tooltip: After using your Double-edged Strike, you spy an opening and seize it doing high damage and having a chance of knocking your opposition into a conjuction state.
trait.description: After using your Double-edged Strike, you make an additional attack, inflicting high damage, with a chance of initiating an opportunity to execute Fellowship skills against the enemy.

trait.name: Noble Savage
trait.tooltip: Your pets have higher Morale and increased offensive and defensive capabilities. You must resummon the pet for this to take effect.
trait.description: Your companions have better morale, attack increase, raised critical chances, increased stealth detection, increased stealth and greater defensive capabilties. You must resummon the companion for this to take effect.

specialEffect.label: The Loyalty and stalwart nature of your pets know no bounds.

trait.name: March of the Ents
trait.tooltip: Only the Eldar and Wizards rival your knowledge of nature, this skill enables you to bring down the wrath of the natural world on your foes.
trait.description: Only the Eldar and Wizards rival your knowledge of nature. You are able to bring down the wrath of the natural world upon your foes.

trait.name: Eagle-friend
trait.tooltip: You are a friend of the eagles and may now summon one to aid you.
trait.description: You are a friend of the Eagles and may summon one to aid you.

trait.name: Flame of Anor
trait.tooltip: Your fire-based skills are more damaging.
trait.description: Your fire-based skills inflict 10% greater damage.

trait.name: Hardy Bear
trait.tooltip: You are able to summon a more powerful bear.
trait.description: The Power of your bear-friend is increased.

stat.name: Skill_VitalCost_Trait_SignPowerCostReduction
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills

trait.name: Use of Fire
trait.tooltip: Enables the Hunter to apply Fire Oil to their arrows.
trait.description: Enables hunters to apply fire-oil to their arrows.

trait.name: Enduring Precision
trait.tooltip: Gain a Focus (Aim) Pip every 10 seconds while in Precision Stance
trait.description: Your Focus increases by 1 every 10 seconds while you are in a Precision Stance.

trait.name: Fast Draw
trait.tooltip: Reduced Induction Time for Barbed Arrow & Swift Arrow
trait.description: You are able to release your Barbed Arrow and Swift Bow more quickly.

trait.name: Bow of the Righteous
trait.tooltip: Acts as a power heal for each Bow Shot.
trait.description: The righteousness of your cause allows you to recover Power with each successful ranged attack.

trait.name: Bard's Arrow
trait.tooltip: You fire with the skill of Bard himself driving fear into evil enemies.
trait.description: You attack with the skill of Bard the Bowman himself, driving fear into your enemies.

trait.name: Press Onward
trait.tooltip: When the need is high, a hunter can pack up and move on with little rest, restoring your power and morale.
trait.description: When the need is great, you can move on with little rest, restoring your Power and Morale.

trait.name: Rain of Thorns
trait.tooltip: You rain five thorn arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to pin multiple targets.
trait.description: You rain 5 thorn-arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to root multiple targets.

trait.name: Rally!
trait.tooltip: The ways of the elder age are not lost to all races yet, you may bring new inspiration to those whose morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated target in combat.
trait.description: The ways of the elder ages are not lost to all races yet. You may bring new inspiration to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated ally in combat.

trait.name: Song of the Hopeful Heart
trait.tooltip: This song enables you to temporarily reduce the dread of an area for sixty seconds.
trait.description: This Song enables you to temporarily reduce the Dread of an area for a short time.

trait.name: Anthem of the Wizards
trait.tooltip: This skill calls upon song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that will slow the creatures who are hit by it, you have a short window after playing a tier 3 song to play one of these, and it will reset your ballad counter back to start.
trait.description: This Anthem allows you to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that slows enemies who are affected by it. You have a short window after playing a tier 3 song to play Anthem, which will reset your Ballad counter to the beginning.

trait.name: Glorious Anthem
trait.tooltip: Increases the duration of your Anthems that use duration effects
trait.description: The duration of your Anthems is increased by 15 seconds.

trait.name: Medium Armour-use
trait.tooltip: You can use Medium Armour.
trait.description: You are able to wear medium armour.

trait.name: Defy Corruption
trait.tooltip: Your Escape from Darkness ability is greatly improved and your Cry of Vengeance will revive one additional ally.
trait.description: Your Escape from Darkness ability is greatly improved and your Cry of Vengeance will revive one additional ally.

trait.name: Shield of the Dúnedain
trait.tooltip: Your voice calls upon the will of the Dunedain protecting a companion but at the cost of half your power.
trait.description: You are able to protect a companion, but at the cost of half your Power.

trait.name: Oathbreaker's Shame
trait.tooltip: You levy a curse on your foe which increases the damage you can do to the creature.
trait.description: You levy a curse upon your foe which increases the damage you can do to it.

trait.name: In Defence of Middle-earth
trait.tooltip: Your very presence inspires those around you to perform better in combat.
trait.description: Your very presence inspires those around you to perform greater deeds in battle.

trait.name: Defiance
trait.tooltip: Increases the duration of Last Stand, and you are healed at the end
trait.description: Your Last Stand lasts longer, and you are healed when it ends.

trait.name: Loyalty
trait.tooltip: Your Herald is better armoured.
trait.description: Your Herald wears stronger armour.

trait.name: Conqueror of the Watching-stones
trait.tooltip: You may pass the watching stones unmolested.
trait.description: You can shrug off the worst effects of the Fell Watching-stones' oppressive will.

trait.name: Use of Light
trait.tooltip: Enables the Hunter to apply Light Oil to their arrows.
trait.description: Enables hunters to apply light-oil to their arrows.

trait.name: Ferocious Strikes
trait.tooltip: An aggressive triple attack that engenders threat.
trait.description: You make an aggressive triple attack that draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

trait.name: Fight On!
trait.tooltip: A Cry of Defiance that robs the monsters of their ability to use power and gives it to you.
trait.description: A cry of defiance that robs enemies of their ability to use Power and transfers it to you.

trait.name: Explosion of Blades
trait.tooltip: A full area-of-effect attack of a huge magnitude but comes at the cost of threat.
trait.description: A full area-of-effect attack that inflicts huge damage, while drawing the attention of your enemies to yourself.

trait.name: Controlled Burn
trait.tooltip: Increases damage and Power regeneration.
trait.description: Your damage and Power recovery are increased.

trait.name: Runic Use
trait.tooltip: Allows the usage of Runes.
trait.description: Allows the use of Runes.

trait.name: Heavy Shield Use
trait.tooltip: Allow wielding of Heavy Shields and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
trait.description: You have the ability to wield heavy shields.

trait.name: Vicious Strikes
trait.tooltip: Increases the critical damage chance of Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
trait.description: Your chance of scoring a Critical Hit is increased for: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike.

trait.name: Parried Blows
trait.tooltip: You regenerate some of your power whenver you parry and incoming attack.
trait.description: You recover some of your Power whenever you parry an incoming attack.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Skill_Duration_Trait_Guardian_ImprovedParryResponse
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Your parry response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.

trait.name: Deflected Blows
trait.tooltip: You regenerate some of your power whenver you block and incoming attack.
trait.description: You recover some of your Power whenever you block an incoming attack.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Skill_Duration_Trait_Guardian_ImprovedBlockResponse
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Your block response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.

trait.name: Shield Spike Use
trait.tooltip: Shield Spike Use
trait.description: Allows the use of shield-spikes

trait.name: To the King
trait.tooltip: You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered from Overwhelm or Shiv, potentially knocking him down.
trait.description: You are able to make a powerful attack against an enemy who has suffered from Overwhelm or Thrust, potentially knocking it down.

trait.name: Shield-smash
trait.tooltip: After a successful Shield Bash or Shield Taunt, you may bash him again with your shield for greater damage. This skill generates additional threat
trait.description: After a successful Shield-bash or Shield-taunt, you may bash your enemy again with your shield for greater damage. This skill more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.

trait.name: Guardian's Threat
trait.tooltip: You focus yourself on enraging your enemies.
trait.description: You focus yourself on enraging your enemies.

trait.name: Challenge the Darkness
trait.tooltip: You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver. This skill generates additional threat and forces nearby opponents to attack you as well as raising guardians ward.
trait.description: You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, leaving your allies free to maneuver. This skill also activates your Guardian's Ward.

trait.name: Master
trait.tooltip: Those that serve the forces of the ring, are beginning to seek conflict with you directly, lest you foil their schemes.
trait.description: Those that serve the Dark Lord of Mordor are beginning to seek conflict with you directly, lest you foil their schemes.

trait.name: Captain's Victory
trait.tooltip: Improves the effects of your Banner of Victory
trait.description: The Power-enhancing effects provided by your Herald of Victory are more effective.

stat.name: Skill_Duration_Trait_Captain_BuffLineBonus
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.

trait.name: Journeyman
trait.tooltip: As a hardy warrior of Middle-Earth, you have seen much conflict.
trait.description: As a hardy warrior of Middle-Earth, you have seen much conflict.

trait.name: Adept
trait.tooltip: The road to saving Middle-Earth is long, but you are already walking it.
trait.description: The road to saving Middle-Earth is long, but you are already walking it.

trait.name: Blood of Númenor
trait.tooltip: Allies renewed by Escape From Darkness will return with full Morale and more Power.
trait.description: Allies revived by Escape From Darkness will return with full Morale and more Power.

trait.name: Now for Wrath
trait.tooltip: Rallying Cry will heal a small amount of power as well
trait.description: Your Rallying Cry will also heal a small amount of power, in addition to its normal effects.

trait.name: Captain of War
trait.tooltip: Increases the attack speed buff of War-cry
trait.description: Your War-cry encourages your allies to attack with even greater speed.

stat.name: Skill_Duration_Trait_Captain_BuffLineBonus
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.

trait.name: Turn of the Tide
trait.tooltip: Your routing cry does more damage and will apply a stun to everyone it effects
trait.description: Your Routing Cry now stuns your foes and inflicts more damage.

trait.name: Renewed Voice
trait.tooltip: Your Battle-shout recovers more quickly than before.
trait.description: Your Battle-shout recovers more quickly than before.

stat.name: Skill_RecoveryTime_Trait_WarCaller
stat.descriptionOverride: Battle Shout now recovers ${VALUE} seconds faster.

trait.name: Focused Strikes
trait.tooltip: Reduces your Miss Chance Modifier
trait.description: Your skill with arms reduces the chance that your attacks will miss.

trait.name: Captain's Valour
trait.tooltip: Improves the effects of your Banner of War
trait.description: The Might and Agility increases provided by your Herald of War are more effective.

stat.name: Skill_Duration_Trait_Captain_BuffLineBonus
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.

trait.name: Fear no Darkness
trait.tooltip: Your Words of Courage will heal more
trait.description: Your Words of Courage greatly increases the morale of your allies.

trait.name: Strong Voice
trait.tooltip: Reduces the power cost of your Cries and Shouts
trait.description: The power costs of your Cries and Shouts are reduced.

trait.name: Captain's Hope
trait.tooltip: Improves the effects of your Banner of Hope
trait.description: The Morale-enhancing effects provided by your Herald of Hope are more effective.

stat.name: Skill_Duration_Trait_Captain_BuffLineBonus
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Mark Skills Reset Timer is reduced ${VALUE} a second.

trait.name: Expert Attacks
trait.tooltip: Increases chance to crit w/ Devastating Blow and Pressing Attack
trait.description: You have a greater chance of landing a Critical Hit with your Devastating Blow and Pressing Attack.

trait.name: Intimidating Shout
trait.tooltip: Increases the threat generated by your Threatening Shout
trait.description: Your Threatening Shout more strongly directs the enemy's ire towards you.

trait.name: Subtle Command
trait.tooltip: Reduces the threat generated by your Cries and Heals
trait.description: Your Cries and healing skills draw less attention from your enemies.

trait.name: Flurry of Blows
trait.tooltip: Your Flurry will last an additional 10 seconds and speed you up an extra 5%. Your total Might is also increased.
trait.description: Your Flurry lasts longer and your attack speed is increased.

trait.name: Swift to Anger
trait.tooltip: Your Swift Strike skill now generates a fervour pip on a successful attack. Your total Might is also increased.
trait.description: Your Swift Strike skill generates 1 additional Fervour on Critical Hits.

trait.name: Deadly Strikes
trait.tooltip: Increases the critical damage multiplier of Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
trait.description: Your damage multiplier for scoring Critical Hits is increased for: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike.

trait.name: Winds of the Storm
trait.tooltip: Your Blade-storm attacks now can effect up to ten targets. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
trait.description: Your Blade-storm now affects up to 10 targets.

trait.name: Braced Against Defeat
trait.tooltip: Your Bracing attack provides additional morale for yourself increasing a small amount for each enemy around you. Blade-wall and Blade-storm also do more damage.
trait.description: Your Bracing attack provides additional morale for yourself increasing a small amount for each enemy around you.

trait.name: Blood-lust
trait.tooltip: Your Wild Attack will generate a fervour pip on a critical. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
trait.description: Your Wild Attack now generates 1 additional Fervour after a Critical Hit.

trait.name: Call of the Wild
trait.tooltip: Your Wild Attack generates additional threat and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
trait.description: Your Wild Attack more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.

trait.name: Stalwart Blade
trait.tooltip: Your Blade-wall skill will generate a fervour pip on a succesful attack. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
trait.description: Your Blade-wall skill generates 1 Fervour for every succesful attack.

trait.name: Deep Strikes
trait.tooltip: On a critical attack Wild Attack, Savage Strikes, and Brutal Strikes will apply an additional bleed. Fervour also adds an extra bonus to damage.
trait.description: On a Critical Hit, the following skills will now apply a bleed: Brutal, Ferocious, Merciful, Relentless and Savage Strike

trait.name: At the Ready
trait.tooltip: Your base block rate is increasd and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
trait.description: You are able to more effectively block attacks.

trait.name: Eye of the Storm
trait.tooltip: Your Blade-storm now requires only 3 pips to execute and costs only 3 pips. Blade-wall and Blade-storm will also do more damage.
trait.description: Your Blade-storm costs and requires only 3 Fervour to execute.

trait.name: Fervent Rage
trait.tooltip: Your Battle Frenzy now fill you fervour meter generating 5 pips. Your total Might is also increased.
trait.description: Your Battle Frenzy generates 5 Fervour, totally filling your Fervour meter.

trait.name: Time of Need
trait.tooltip: Your Dire Need skill now also increases fervour by 5 pips. Your total Might is also increased.
trait.description: Dire Need now increases your Fervour by 5 and recovers 5 minutes faster.

trait.name: Patience
trait.tooltip: Your Exchange of Blows procs more often, produces additional threat, and will lessen the effects of your fervour penalty.
trait.description: Your Exchange of Blows executes more often and more effectively draws your enemy's attention to yourself.

trait.name: Stinging Blow
trait.tooltip: Sting resets more quickly and does more damage. Your base Might is also increased.
trait.description: You attack more quickly with your Sting skill, inflicting greater damage.

trait.name: Reactive Block
trait.tooltip: Damage your attacker whenever you block an incoming attack. Your base Might is also increased.
trait.description: You damage your attacker whenever you block an incoming attack.

trait.name: Guardian's Ward
trait.tooltip: Your Guardian's Ward also increases your natrual damage mitigation. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
trait.description: Your Guardian's Ward increases your common damage mitigation.

stat.name: Skill_AdditionalThreat_AllSkillsMod
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat

trait.name: Defensive Expertise
trait.tooltip: Increases the Block Rate & Mitigation boost provided by your shield. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
trait.description: You use your shield more efficiently, blocking more and reducing the damage dealt to you.

stat.name: Skill_AdditionalThreat_AllSkillsMod
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat

trait.name: Controlled Breathing
trait.tooltip: Your Catch a Breath skill heals additional morale and also heals power. Your base Vitality is also increased.
trait.description: Your Catch a Breath skill heals additional Morale and also heals Power.

trait.name: Harasser
trait.tooltip: Your Vexing Blow may hit up to two targets in a 90-degree arc and recovers faster. Your base Vitality is also increased.
trait.description: Vexing Blow can hit two additional targets in a 90-degree arc and recovers 1.5 seconds faster.

trait.name: To the Rescue
trait.tooltip: Your base movement rate is increasted by 5%. Your vitality is also increased.
trait.description: You are able to move more quickly in and out of battle.

trait.name: Quickness
trait.tooltip: Increases your base attack rate by 5%. Your base Might is also increased.
trait.description: Your attack speed is increased beyond your normal abilities.

trait.name: Grim Challenge
trait.tooltip: Your Challenge skills takes less time to reset. Your base Vitality is also increased.
trait.description: Your Challenge skill recovers 15 seconds quicker.

trait.name: Selfless Defence
trait.tooltip: Your Protection skill now reduces the threat generated by your target and increases threat generated by you. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
trait.description: Your Protection skill makes your target less threatening.

stat.name: Skill_AdditionalThreat_AllSkillsMod
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat

trait.name: Stoic
trait.tooltip: Your base vitality and fate are increased. All of your special attacks generate additional threat as well.
trait.description: Your stoic nature increases your base Vitality and Fate.

stat.name: Skill_AdditionalThreat_AllSkillsMod
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Skills add additional threat

trait.name: Strong Lungs
trait.tooltip: Deep Breath resets faster and lasts longer. Your base Might is also increased.
trait.description: Your strong lungs enable Deep Breath to recover 2.5 minutes quicker.

trait.name: Brave Heart
trait.tooltip: Warrior's Heart resets faster and opens up all your base reactionary skills.
trait.description: Warrior's Heart recovers 90 seconds quicker and allows you to use your reactive skills.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Skill_Duration_Trait_Guardian_ImprovedShieldSwipeResponse
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Your Shield Swipe response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.

trait.name: Heat of Battle
trait.tooltip: Thrill of Danger resets faster and opens up all your base reactionary skills.
trait.description: Thrill of Danger recovers 2 minutes quicker and allows you to use your reactive skills.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Skill_Duration_Trait_Guardian_ImprovedRetaliateResponse
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Your Retaliation response effect lasts an additional 3 sec.

trait.name: Sturdy Traps
trait.tooltip: Decreased chance for monsters to break free of your trap on damage
trait.description: It is more difficult for enemies to break free of your traps.

trait.name: Rapid Recovery
trait.tooltip: Reduced Recovery Time of all melee skills
trait.description: All of your melee skills recover more quickly than before.

trait.name: Barbed Fury
trait.tooltip: Increased Magnitude of Barbed Arrow DOT
trait.description: Wounds caused by your Barbed Arrow bleed more profusely.

trait.name: Swift and True
trait.tooltip: Increased Damage with Swift Bow
trait.description: Your Swift Bow inflicts greater damage to your enemies.

trait.name: Strong Draw
trait.tooltip: Penetrating Shot costs one less Focus (Aim) Pip
trait.description: The Focus cost for your Penetrating Shot is reduced by 1.

trait.name: Heightened Senses
trait.tooltip: Increased Tracking range, Track stealthed monsters, Increased overall stealth detection
trait.description: Your exceptional senses allow you to track creatures over a greater distance, even if they are using Stealth, and to more easily detect creatures using Stealth.

trait.name: Hail of Arrows
trait.tooltip: Rain of Arrows now criticals more often
trait.description: You have a greater chance of landing Critical Hits with your Rain of Arrows, and the Critical Hits do more damage.

trait.name: Arrow Storm
trait.tooltip: Rain of Arrows costs one less Focus (Aim) Pip
trait.description: The Focus cost for your Rain of Arrows is reduced by 1.

trait.name: Deep Concentration
trait.tooltip: Intent Concentration also restores some Power
trait.description: Your Intent Concentration also restores some Power, in addition to its normal effects.

trait.name: Deadly Precision
trait.tooltip: Ranged Critical Hits increase your Focus (Aim) by one Pip
trait.description: When you land a Critical Hit with a ranged attack, your Focus increases by 1.

trait.name: True Shot
trait.tooltip: Penetrating Shot Bypasses More Mitigation
trait.description: Your Penetrating Shot pierces more deeply through your enemy's armour, ignoring more of the armour's damage reduction.

trait.name: Graceful Draw
trait.tooltip: Endurance Stance further reduces Power Cost of: Barbed Arrow, Penetrating Shot, Merciful Shot, Swift Bow, Rain of Arrows and Quick Shot.
trait.description: Your Endurance Stance further reduces the Power cost and threat generation of your ranged skills.

trait.name: Stealthy Shot
trait.tooltip: Beneath Notice further lowers threat
trait.description: Beneath Notice lasts 10 seconds longer and draws even less attention from your enemies.

trait.name: Swift Recovery
trait.tooltip: Reduced Recovery Time for Needful Haste and Intent Concentration
trait.description: Your Needful Haste and Intent Concentration recover more quickly.

trait.name: Master of the Staff
trait.tooltip: You have a chance of stunning an enemy with power from your staff strike and increase your confidence and thus your overall morale.
trait.description: Staff Strike is more damaging, can stun opponents and will do bonus damage on flanked enemies. Your training also makes you more confident in battle.

trait.name: Power and Wisdom
trait.tooltip: This improves the effects of your Ancient Wisdom and enables you to use your Power of Knowledge skill for a longer period of time.
trait.description: This improves your Ancient Wisdom effect magnitude and enables you to use your Power of Knowledge skill for a longer period of time.

trait.name: Light of Hope
trait.tooltip: Your Beacon of Hope ability costs you less Morale.
trait.description: Beacon of Hope has a lower Morale cost, recovers faster and has a shorter cast time.

trait.name: Master of Beasts
trait.tooltip: Your knowledge of the Signs of Animals gives you greater control over them, lessening the skill cost and enhancing their duration.
trait.description: Your knowledge of the Signs of the Wild gives you greater control over them, lessening their cost and enhancing their duration.

stat.name: Skill_VitalCost_Trait_SignPowerCostReduction
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills

trait.name: Deep Lore
trait.tooltip: Your number of targets for Fire-lore, Wind-lore, and Herb-lore are increased.
trait.description: Your knowledge of herbs, fire, and wind are unmatched, increasing your ability to use them.

trait.name: Healer
trait.tooltip: The costs of your remedy skills and the time it takes to execute them are reduced. This includes Beacon of Hope, Tend the Sick, Leechcraft, Share the Power, and Inner Flame
trait.description: You gain a number of bonuses to your healing and restorative skills.

trait.name: Beast-lore
trait.tooltip: The combat prowess of your pets is increased.
trait.description: The Combat Prowess of your companions are increased. This includes, attack, defense, and stealth detection.

stat.name: Skill_VitalCost_Trait_SignPowerCostReduction
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills

specialEffect.label: Your animals have increased health, increased power, attack faster and deal more damage.

trait.name: Dúnadan-learning
trait.tooltip: You gain bonuses to the Sign of Righteousness and Sign of Vigilance skills.
trait.description: You are well versed in the knowledge of the Dúnedain and their signs, allowing you to increase their duration and effectiveness. This includes: Sign of Righteousness and Sign of Vigilance.

stat.name: Skill_VitalCost_Trait_SignPowerCostReduction
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: ${PERCENTVALUE} power costs of all sign skills

trait.name: Harmony with Nature
trait.tooltip: You gain a bonus to Power costs for overt displays of magical power. This includes Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn, and Ents go to War.
trait.description: Reduces power costs and the casting time of your overt displays of magical power. This includes: Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.

trait.name: Awareness of Body
trait.tooltip: The Morale costs of your overt displays of magical power are reduced. This includes Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.
trait.description: This gives you a reduction to the morale costs on overt displays of magical power. This includes: Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Test of Will, Light of the Rising Dawn and Ents go to War.

trait.name: Subtlety of Wisdom
trait.tooltip: You have a keen understanding of what it means to be a keeper of ancient lore in Middle-earth, often going unnoticed when you do choose to call upon your knowledge.
trait.description: You have a keen understanding of what it means to be a keeper of ancient lore in Middle-earth, often going unnoticed when you do choose to call upon your knowledge.

stat.name: Skill_AdditionalThreat_subtlewizard
stat.descriptionOverride: Decreased threat when using damaging skills

trait.name: Proof against All Ills
trait.tooltip: Your Tend the Sick and Leechcraft skills can affect up to six targets.
trait.description: Your Tend the Sick and Leechcraft works on all allies within an area-of-effect. This also enables Leechcraft to be used in combat.

trait.name: Knowledge of the Past
trait.tooltip: Your skills have a chance to restore a small amount of Power.
trait.description: All of your skills have a chance to restore a small amount of Power.

trait.name: Magic Adept
trait.tooltip: Your magical abilities cost less Power. This includes Signs, Cracked Earth, Gust of Wind, Power of Knowledge, Share the Power, Light of the Rising Dawn, and Ents Go to War.
trait.description: All of your magical skills have a lower cost to your Power.

trait.name: Strength of Voice
trait.tooltip: Increased Duration of Tier 3 Ballads
trait.description: The duration of your Ballads is increased by 10 seconds.

trait.name: Battle-hymn
trait.tooltip: Increased In-Combat Regen Effect when casting Anthem of Valar
trait.description: When using Anthem of the Valar, your regeneration in combat is increased.

trait.name: Heralded Saviour
trait.tooltip: Increase the Effectiveness of Song of Aid
trait.description: Your Song of Aid lasts 10 seconds longer and recovers 20% faster.

trait.name: Harmonious Melody
trait.tooltip: Increases the duration you have to play the next tier of your ballads.
trait.description: Gain a 5 second longer window of opportunity in which to perform tiered Ballads.

trait.name: Herald's Hammer
trait.tooltip: Your Heralds Strike is more likely to crit.
trait.description: Your Herald's Strike deals double damage.

trait.name: Smooth Voice
trait.tooltip: This skill transforms your Ballad of Vigour and Ballad of Balance to become slower songs, that no longer deal damage but act upon your fellowship for a longer duration.
trait.description: This skill transforms your Ballad of Vigour and Ballad of Balance into slower songs that no longer deal damage, but act upon your fellowship for a longer duration.

trait.name: Powerful Voice
trait.tooltip: Reduces the power cost of all cries.
trait.description: The Power costs of all your Cries are reduced.

trait.name: Life-singer
trait.tooltip: Decreases the powercost for all morale increasing abilities.
trait.description: The Power costs for your morale-renewing skills are reduced.

trait.name: Unrelenting
trait.tooltip: When you land a Critical Hit with your Piercing Cry, your enemy is stunned. This trait also causes your Piercing Cry to recover faster.
trait.description: When you land a Critical Hit with your Piercing Cry, your enemy is stunned. Piercing Cry gains 25% to it's critical chance and it's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

trait.name: Focused Performance
trait.tooltip: Your inductions are harder to interrupt.
trait.description: Your induction skills execute quicker, making you harder to disrupt.

trait.name: Light in the Dark
trait.tooltip: Your Tier 1 and Tier 2 Ballads inflict more damage to your enemies.
trait.description: Your Tier 1 and Tier 2 Ballads inflict more damage to your enemies.

trait.name: Graceful Demeanour
trait.tooltip: This adds an increased morale and power resurrection to the skills that bring you back from defeat.
trait.description: Enlivening Grace and Rally grant more morale and power. Rally's cast time is reduced by 2 seconds and it's recovery time is reduced by 5 minutes.

trait.name: Silver Tongue
trait.tooltip: Song Skills Recharge Faster
trait.description: All of your Songs recover 20% faster.

trait.name: Subtle Movements
trait.tooltip: Reduced aggro on all special Minstrel abilities.
trait.description: The use of your skills draws less attention from your enemies.

trait.name: Cunning Wound
trait.tooltip: DOT magnitude of Cunning Attack increased
trait.description: The wounds caused by your Cunning Attacks bleed more profusely.

trait.name: Swift and Subtle
trait.tooltip: Subtle Knife deals increased damage
trait.description: You are able to use your Subtle Stab skill with greater speed, inflicting more damage.

trait.name: Perplexing Riddle
trait.tooltip: Riddle stuns before mezing
trait.description: Your Riddles are far more perplexing than your foes can comprehend, both stunning and mesmerizing them.

trait.name: Hidden Dagger
trait.tooltip: Decreased chance for Stealth attacks to Miss,Parry,Block,Evade
trait.description: Your attacks while using Stealth are far more accurate, reducing the chances that you may miss or that your enemy may somehow avoid them.

trait.name: Focused Eye
trait.tooltip: Reduce the cooldown on Aim
trait.description: You are able to take Aim more quickly than you once did.

stat.name: Skill_RecoveryTime_Trait_QuickDraw
stat.descriptionOverride: Reduces the recovery time of Aim by ${VALUE}s.

trait.name: Side-step
trait.tooltip: Increased Ability To Evade
trait.description: You are able to evade attacks more easily than before.

trait.name: Trickster
trait.tooltip: Dust In The Eyes - Affects multiple nearby targets
trait.description: Your Dust in the Eyes skill affects multiple enemies nearby.

stat.name: ForwardSource_Combat_TraitCombo2
stat.descriptionOverride: Dust in the Eyes is now AOE.

stat.name: EffectMod_VOT_PerIntervalChangeMult_AddMod1_Trait_Tricks
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.

trait.name: Strike from Shadows
trait.tooltip: Increased chance for Stealth attacks to score a Critical Hit
trait.description: You are able to land precise blows when attacking while using Stealth, increasing your chances of landing a Critical Hit with Surprise Strike, Cunning Attack, or Provoke.

trait.name: Footpad
trait.tooltip: Increase Effective Stealth Level
trait.description: Your ability to move about with Stealth has developed beyond your natural aptitude.

trait.name: Disabling Attack
trait.tooltip: Disable - Further decrease attack speed
trait.description: You are able to use your Disable skill to greatly reduce your enemy's speed.

stat.name: EffectMod_VOT_PerIntervalChangeMult_AddMod1_Trait_Tricks
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.

trait.name: Opportunist
trait.tooltip: Counter Defence - Increase Target Critical Hit Vulnerability
trait.description: Improves your Counter Defence skill to further increase your opponent's vulnerability to Critical Hits.

stat.name: EffectMod_VOT_PerIntervalChangeMult_AddMod1_Trait_Tricks
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.

trait.name: Overwhelming Odds
trait.tooltip: Magnitude of your Trick debuffs Increase after participation in a successful conjunction
trait.description: Completing a Fellowship Manoeuvre will empower the burglar, based on what Manoeuvre was completed.

trait.name: Leaf-walker
trait.tooltip: You are able to move more quickly while using Stealth.
trait.description: Your Stealth is improved, allowing you to move more quickly while sneaking about.

trait.name: Blind Fury
trait.tooltip: Enrage - Suppress ranged skills
trait.description: When you Enrage your foes, they are likely to engage you in melee combat.

stat.name: EffectMod_VOT_PerIntervalChangeMult_AddMod1_Trait_Tricks
stat.descriptionOverride: Line Bonus: Increases Mischievous Glee Healing by ${PERCENTVALUE} and 1 pulse.

trait.name: Charity
trait.description: Charity has its rewards. You find yourself more resistant to wounds, able to defend against ranged attacks more easily, and able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat.

trait.name: Compassion
trait.description: Your compassion is one of your greatest strengths. You find that you are able to defend against ranged attacks more easily, are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, and are able to defend against magical attacks more easily.

trait.name: Confidence
trait.description: Your actions have instilled in you a great sense of confidence. You are more resistant to the effects of fear, your Will is stronger, and you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat.

trait.name: Determination
trait.description: Your determination has won you many victories. You have superior Agility, you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat, and your Morale is increased.

trait.name: Discipline
trait.description: The discipline you maintain makes you stronger. Your Might is increased, you are more resistant to diseases, and are able to defend against melee attacks more easily.

trait.name: Empathy
trait.description: You have a proven empathy for those in need. You know how to use your armour to greater effect, you are destined to a greater Fate, and you are more resistant to the effects of fear.

trait.name: Fidelity
trait.description: Your fidelity has earned you the respect of those around you. You are more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow, you have greater Vitality, and your Power is increased.

trait.name: Fortitude
trait.description: Your struggles have built in you tremendous fortitude. You find that you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat, your Might is increased, and you are more resistant to diseases.

trait.name: Honesty
trait.description: Your honesty has earned you the trust of those around you. Your Power is increased, you know how to use your armour to greater effect, and you are destined to a greater Fate.

trait.name: Honour
trait.description: Your honour is without peer. You are more resistant to poisons, more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow, and you have greater Vitality.

trait.name: Idealism
trait.description: Your idealism can brook no fault. You are destined to a greater Fate, you are more resistant to the effects of fear, and your Will is stronger.

trait.name: Justice
trait.description: You are a servant of justice. You find that you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat, your Morale is increased, and you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat.

trait.name: Loyalty
trait.description: Your loyalty shall be rewarded. You find that you have greater Vitality, your Power is increased, and you know how to use your armour to greater effect.

trait.name: Mercy
trait.description: You have learned the value of mercy. You find that you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, are able to defend against magical attacks more easily, and have superior Agility.

trait.name: Patience
trait.description: Patience is a virtue. You find yourself able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, more resistant to wounds, and able to defend against ranged attacks more easily.

trait.name: Innocence
trait.description: Your innocence can be used as a shield. You find yourself able to defend against melee attacks more easily, more resistant to poisons, and more resistant to the effects of evil's shadow.

trait.name: Tolerance
trait.description: Your tolerance of others has earned you great respect. You find that you are able to defend against magical attacks more easily, you have superior Agility, and you are able to recover your Morale more quickly in combat.

trait.name: Valour
trait.description: No one can ever question your valour. Your Morale is increased, you are able to recover your Morale more quickly outside of combat, and your Might is increased.

trait.name: Wisdom
trait.description: You have found true wisdom. Your Will is stronger, you are able to recover your Power more quickly outside of combat, and you are more resistant to wounds.

trait.name: Zeal
trait.description: Your zeal drives you to perfection. You find yourself more resistant to diseases, able to defend against melee attacks more easily, and more resistant to poisons.

trait.name: Small Size
trait.tooltip: Reduced Might - Hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.
trait.description: Reduced Might - Hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-toughness
trait.tooltip: Improved Vitality - Hobbits are remarkably tough.
trait.description: Improved Vitality - Hobbits are remarkably tough.

trait.name: Rapid Recovery
trait.tooltip: Improved out of combat Morale Regeneration - Hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.
trait.description: Improved Morale Regeneration out of combat - Hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-courage
trait.tooltip: Improved Fear Resistance - The slow-kindled courage of the Hobbit Race.
trait.description: Improved Fear Resistance - The slow-kindled courage of the Hobbit Race.

trait.name: Resist Corruption
trait.tooltip: Improved Shadow Mitigation - Hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.
trait.description: Improved Shadow Mitigation - Hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.

trait.tooltip: This grants you a short ranged attack.
trait.description: You gain a short-distance ranged attack.

trait.name: Hobbit-stature

trait.description: You have overcome your humble beginnings and play a mighty role in this age. Your Might is improved.

trait.tooltip: You can raise your own hope value through good old fashion hobbit cheer.
trait.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

trait.name: Hobbit-stealth
trait.tooltip: Although untrained you have the ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.
trait.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

trait.name: Hobbit-silence
trait.tooltip: Prone hobbits are easily ignored when they are thought of as a tasty dinner, causing enemies to ignore you.
trait.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

trait.description: Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.

trait.name: Diminishing of Mankind
trait.tooltip: Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.
trait.description: Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.

trait.name: Easily Inspired
trait.tooltip: Increased Morale Restoration- Men can be roused to action faster than the other races. (heals heal for more on men)
trait.description: Increased Morale Restoration- Men are more quickly emboldened than the other races.

stat.name: Mood_Healing_Modifier
stat.descriptionOverride: The Race of Man, when pressed, respond well to impassioned speeches that raise morale.

trait.name: Endurance of Stone

trait.description: For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

trait.name: Dwarf-endurance
trait.tooltip: Adds a bonus to your fellowships vitality.
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Vitality.

trait.name: Clever Devices
trait.tooltip: Enables the Burglar to use devices such as caltrops, marbles and stun dust.
trait.description: Enables burglars to use devices such as caltrops, marbles, and stun dust.

trait.name: Tools of the Trade

trait.description: Enables burglars to use special tools to faciliate their clever tricks.

trait.name: Fellowship's Heart
trait.tooltip: This skill instantly cures any fear effects you have, and also makes the entire fellowship immune to fear for a short period of time, as well as acting as a heal over time.
trait.description: This skill instantly cures any fear effects upon you. It also makes your entire fellowship immune to fear for a short period of time, as well as healing them over time.
